member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Gets or sets the audit identifier prefix to append to the generated audit identifer.The audit identifier is generated to be "prefix username:operation"..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.AzMan.Configuration.Design.Properties.Resources.StoreLocationDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Gets or sets the authorization store location Active Directory or xml file. For xml file storage - msxml://c:/temp/authstore.xml. For Active Directory storage - msldap://myserver/CN=MyStore,OU=AzMan,DC=MyDomain,DC=Com.
